description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix application, responsible for handling HTTP requests, setting CORS headers, and rendering server streams for client or bot requests.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main export that handles incoming HTTP requests, distinguishes between bot and browser requests, and delegates rendering.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering streaming for bot requests, outputs full HTML response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering streaming for browser requests, outputs client-optimized HTML response.
